name: Gravity Illusion
description:
Hey, this our first ever GameJam project.

It's a 2Player platformer game, where you can change gravity to avoid dying

Let me know how good/bad the balancing is; I don't have a friend  right now to playtest it (bc it's like 2am lol, had to fix some bugs :/). I actually have a lot of ideas to expand on that concept (like sawblades, doublejumps, ways to change what you can walk through in the middle of the game, make it a 4 player game and so on), but sadly we don't have the time to implement them just now.
